item.title: Swear Box
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

Here: Australian Version of your script:

var
frmDesign : TForm;
Button1 : TButton;
i, e : Integer;

function ReturnInsult : string;
var
Insults : array of string;
begin
SetArrayLength(Insults, 10);
Insults[0] := ‘Gidday,Hey,OI,Cut that swearing out.’;
Insults[1] := ‘Thats it im telling your mum.’;
Insults[2] := ‘!!stop!!’;
Insults[3] := ‘Omg…stop now.’;
Insults[4] := ‘Everytime you swear you kill a puppy.’;
Insults[5] := ‘Think About the Puppys!’;
Insults[6] := ‘Ok…happy? killed 6 puppys.’;
Insults[7] := ‘Well then…suppose we could kill 6 puppys a swear word’;
Insults[8] := ‘Congratulations, Your Puppy Killing Level Is 99’;
Insults[9] := ‘Thats it, im phoning your mom.’;
if e = GetArrayLength(Insults) then e := 0;
Result := Insults[e];
e := e + 1;
i := i + 1;
end;

procedure Clicky(sender: TObject);
begin
GetApplication.MessageBox(ReturnInsult, 'Insults total = ’ + IntToStr(i), 0);
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 197;
frmDesign.Height := 104;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Swear Box AUS Version’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.OnClick := @Clicky;
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 10;
Button1.Top := 10;
Button1.Width := 125;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Click Here If you swear’;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
end.

Read full topic

item.title: Swear Box
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

bobby:

This is even more pointless than the other things.

You could see it as pointless, but many other people may see it as a learning opportunity. Look at all the things Ooo Java has used in his script.

He used a form which many people still do not know how to create.
He used a button form component which has an event, which some people who know how to make forms, don’t know how to do.
He used GetApplication.Messagebox() which is rarely used. First time I saw it used was in Kanes Keylogger, then other people started using it.

He did forget to free the form. But other than that, this is great to learn from.

Read full topic

item.title: Swear Box
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

Got a swearing problem? Take this!!!

Hey, This is my 2nd Scar script…so i hope its good!

I’ll add more.More scripts to come soon!

[code]var
frmDesign : TForm;
Button1 : TButton;
i, e : Integer;

function ReturnInsult : string;
var
Insults : array of string;
begin
SetArrayLength(Insults, 10);
Insults[0] := ‘Oi,Cut that swearing out.’;
Insults[1] := ‘Thats it im telling your mom.’;
Insults[2] := ‘!!stop!!’;
Insults[3] := ‘Omg…stop now.’;
Insults[4] := ‘Everytime you swear you kill a puppy.’;
Insults[5] := ‘Think About the Puppys!’;
Insults[6] := ‘Ok…happy? killed 6 puppys.’;
Insults[7] := ‘Well then…suppose we could kill 6 puppys a swear word’;
Insults[8] := ‘Congratulations, Your Puppy Killing Level Is 99’;
Insults[9] := ‘Thats it, im phoning your mom.’;
if e = GetArrayLength(Insults) then e := 0;
Result := Insults[e];
e := e + 1;
i := i + 1;
end;

procedure Clicky(sender: TObject);
begin
GetApplication.MessageBox(ReturnInsult, 'Insults total = ’ + IntToStr(i), 0);
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 197;
frmDesign.Height := 104;
frmDesign.Caption := ‘Swear Box’;
frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := False;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.OnClick := @Clicky;
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.Left := 10;
Button1.Top := 10;
Button1.Width := 125;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Caption := ‘Click Here If you swear’;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

begin
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
end.[/code]
-Ooo Java/Ollie
